title: Engineering Escherichia coli with a symbiotic plasmid for the production of phenylpyruvic acid
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26580-26584
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03707C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tianzhen Xiong, Qiuyue Gao, Jiting Zhang, Jiaguang Zhang, Can Zhang, Huidie Yue, Junling Liu, Dingyuan Bai, Jinying Li
An engineered Escherichia coli strain was constructed, and the plasmid copy number remained stable without antibiotic selection pressure. This work extends the production methods for whole-cell biotransformation.
